biography.bio: This buxom temptress gave her all to every film she was in. Beginning with her debut performance in Cheerleader Academy (1986), Blondi demonstrated a fiery passion in each role she undertook. Her only boy/girl scenes were done with her then boyfriend Tony Montana, but she did plenty of lesbian flicks to keep everyone happy. She and Montana broke up towards the end of her career, which is one of the reasons she quit doing porn. She made only 50 films from 1986 to 1988. She also had a career as a mud-wrestler at Hollywood's Tropicana Club during that time. Since then she has gone on to be a successful feature dancer working around the country. Many people complained that her body was a bit too hard or muscular at times, as she was very athletic looking. She started doing porn with small breasts, but soon got them enlarged to the point where they looked too fake! Blondi's best work can be seen in The Adultress (1987), Dirty Blondes (1987) and What Ever Turns You On (1987).
biography.name: Blondi

biography.bio: Gorgeous and voluptuous actress, stripper, and exotic dancer Venus DeLight was born Lynn Chase on October 7, 1968 in St. Paul, Minnesota. The blue-eyed blonde bombshell moved to California and studied acting at both UCLA and the Lee Strasberg Institute. She started her career in the adult entertainment industry as a house dancer in several Los Angeles clubs. Venus toured across America in the 1980's as part of the fire eating duo Two Hot to Handle and has performed all over the world as a burlesque striptease artist. A former publisher of the magazine "Cheri," DeLight won the Miss Nude Universe title six times and has been inducted into the Strippers Hall of Fame. Moreover, Venus has also worked as a professional wrestler for such companies as California Wildcats, APL Wrestling, and Sabre Studios. She appears as herself in the documentary "Stripper" and has acted in a handful of racy adult movies.
biography.name: Venus DeLight

biography.bio: Comely, buxom, and shapely platinum blonde bombshell Lois Ayres was born on May 24, 1962 in Boston, Massachusetts. Lois started out in the adult entertainment industry as a nude model in various men's magazines. Ayres first began performing in explicit hardcore movies in the early 1980's; among the notable companies she appeared in X-rated features for are VCA, AVC, Wet Video, LA Video, Exquisite, Coast To Coast, and Leisure Time Entertainment. Lois took a hiatus in the late 1980's in order to recover from drug addiction, but returned to porn a couple of years later. In 1996 Ayres was working as a stripper in Japan, where she earned about $30,000 a week. Lois retired from the adult film industry in the mid 1990's and has been inducted into the AVN Hall of Fame for her contributions to hardcore cinema.
biography.name: Lois Ayres

biography.bio: Exquisitely buxom, leggy, and slender 5'6" brunette knockout Krista Lane was born on February 26, 1959 in Germany. Krista first began performing in explicit hardcore movies in her mid-twenties in 1985; she rose to prominence in lead roles in X-rated pictures in the mid to late 1980s that were made by such notable companies as VCA, Vivid, AVC, and Metro. Lane won AVN Awards for Best Couples Sex Scene - Video in 1987 and both Best Actress - Film and Best Couples Sex Scene - Film the following year. biography.name: Krista Lane
